org.araneaframework.framework.core
Class BaseFilterService

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.core.BaseComponent
      org.araneaframework.core.BaseService
          org.araneaframework.framework.core.BaseFilterService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, FilterService, java.io.Serializable, Service
Direct Known Subclasses:
NopFilterService, SpringOptionalFilterService, StandardContainerService, StandardContinuationFilterService, StandardCriticalExceptionHandlingFilterService, StandardFileImportFilterService, StandardFileUploadFilterService, StandardFilterChainService, StandardHttpResponseFilterService, StandardJspFilterService, StandardLocalizationFilterService, StandardMountingFilterService, StandardMountPointFilterService, StandardRequestEncodingFilterService, StandardStatisticFilterService, StandardSynchronizingFilterService, StandardThreadCloningFilterService, StandardUpdateRegionFilterService
public class BaseFilterService
extends BaseService
implements FilterService

A filter service is a Service which filters requests to its child service. A filter overrides one of the methods:

  • action(Path, InputData, OutputData)
and does the filtering by allowing the action to be invoked on the child or not. This class is a skeleton which lets all the requests through, sets the child, handles the initilization and destroying of the child.

The child is initilized with getChildServiceEnvironment() which by default returns this component's Environment. For alternate environments it should be overridden.

protected void action(Path path,

Description copied from class: BaseService
Services provide their services through the action method. An implementation of a non-composite service like BaseService uses the action method to hook in the middle of the action routing and provide filtering, logging etc.
